definition: specific topic (addressed by a book, lecture, TV program etc)/article, report or program etc on a specific topic
for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized
topic/problem for discussion/exam question/subject/to inscribe/to mention/CL:個|个[ge4],道[dao4]

sentences.english: Students are also required to assess their project in a final oral presentation.
sentences.chinese: 學生也需以期終口頭簡報方式來評估其專題。

sentences.english: This article trades a special study about spatial design for subway.
sentences.chinese: 本文是關於地鐵換乘空間設計的一項專題研究。

sentences.english: The society decided on(upon)a lecture series and appointed a committeeman to determine the dates, etc.
sentences.chinese: 一系列的聯誼活動，座談會，漢語課程和專題講座。

sentences.english: Method Investigation was carried out by using focus group discussion of medical anthropology.
sentences.chinese: 方法採用醫學人類學的專題性訪談進行調查。

sentences.english: Education Science Institute of Shijingshan District carries out the research on comprehensive practice and activity curriculum in primary and secondary schools.
sentences.chinese: 區教科所對我區進行了綜合實踐活動課程的專題調研。

sentences.english: Exemplary into about deep foundation pit bracing design methodology.
sentences.chinese: 專題部分爲關於深基坑支護設計方法的研究。

sentences.english: ALL must be developed in accordance with weekly milestones.
sentences.chinese: 但所有專題須和每週進度符合。

sentences.english: Mr. Zheng Guoguang, Director of China Meteorological Administration, attended the meeting and delivered a special report.
sentences.chinese: 中國氣象局局長鄭國光到會作專題報告。

sentences.english: The feature in this section seems to set up a round-table conversation.
sentences.chinese: 本期的“注目”專題，更像是試圖搭建一次圓桌對話。

sentences.english: The project assignment below is directed to students enrolled in the course.
sentences.chinese: 下列所列出的專題會分派給選修這堂課的學生。

sentences.english: Each project is worth 25% of the final grade.
sentences.chinese: 每個專題佔學期成績的25%。

sentences.english: This subject is covered more in the upcoming articles of this series.
sentences.chinese: 本系列後面的文章將更詳細地討論這個專題。

sentences.english: Projects include analysis of ship lines drawings and ship model testing.
sentences.chinese: 專題包括對船舶線型圖紙及船模實驗的分析。
爲時整學期的專題和論文。
我也喜歡專題報道這樣的節目。

sentences.english: In the thesis the criterion of evaluation has been given.
sentences.chinese: 論文中嘗試給出了專題學習網站的評價標準。

definition: for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized
to plot/to scheme/to bring about/to engineer/planning/producer/planner
to interview/to gather news/to hunt for and collect/to cover
regular column or segment (in a publication or broadcast program)/program (TV or radio)
